thread.title: Comment on LIVE STREAM: Massive Fire Engulfs Downtown Raleigh by TJ
thread.title_full: Comment on LIVE STREAM: Massive Fire Engulfs Downtown Raleigh by TJ

author: TJ
title: Comment on LIVE STREAM: Massive Fire Engulfs Downtown Raleigh by TJ
text:
According to the Raleigh Police Department , no injuries have been reported so far. 
Watch live news coverage from the scene in the video above. 
The fire reportedly started at an apartment complex that was under construction near 300 West North St. The site on fire is reportedly located next to Glenwood South restaurant and the bar district. 
Details on how the huge fire started havenâ€™t yet been disclosed. This is an active situation and it will be updated once more information is made available. 
For additional news coverage, watch the video below. 
Early reports from online users showed a massive response to the huge flames. Twitter users posted a video of a crane at a nearby construction site collapsing. BREAKING: Massive fire engulfs downtown Raleigh, NC construction site; nearby buildings threatened
